thread.section_title: WowVendor.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WowVendor.com | wowvendor.com | 4 of 14
thread.title: Mallory Hicks

author: Mallory Hicks
title: Mallory Hicks
text: I'll be very honest. I was EXTREMELY skeptical, but I figured, sure why not I wanted to finish the Kara run and never could get a group to accept me.. First off I messed up my order, I bought the wrong region. They were kind enough to walk me through fixing my mistake and paying the difference. The service was prompt, they were nice even though I kept messing up and they took care of me. Even gave some pointers of when to be careful of aoe. Overall time from purchase to end of run, I believe was a total of 2.5 hours, give or take. I would defiantly recommend if ever asked! And I may use them again this weekend for a raid. :)
